thread.title: Great Western Mining unable to justify share jump
thread.title_full: Great Western Mining unable to justify share jump

title: Great Western Mining unable to justify share jump
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Aug 25, 2015, 18:29 BST - UK Markets closed Great Western Mining unable to justify share jump By Daniel Cancian | Sharecast – 32 minutes ago 6.57 -0.140 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Ireland (Other OTC: IRLD - news ) -based Great Western Mining Corporation said it could not attribute the move in its share price to any specific reason. Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in the group, which is engaged in the exploration and mining for copper, silver, gold and other minerals in Nevada, were up 35% early on Tuesday morning. 
"The board is also satisfied that all information of a price-sensitive nature has previously been notified to the market," the company said in a short statement. 
Great Western Mining shares were up 0.78% to 0.635p at 1605 BST on Tuesday.
